BlackBox.name: Clash.Promoted.Nat.flogBaseSNat
BlackBox.type:
Clash.Promoted.Nat.flogBaseSNat :: (2 <= base, 1 <= x)
                                                     => SNat base -- ARG[2]
                                                     -> SNat x    -- ARG[3]
                                                     -> SNat (FLog base x

includes.name: flogBase

BlackBox.name: Clash.Promoted.Nat.clogBaseSNat
BlackBox.type:
Clash.Promoted.Nat.clogBaseSNat :: (2 <= base, 1 <= x)
                                                     => SNat base -- ARG[2]
                                                     -> SNat x    -- ARG[3]
                                                     -> SNat (CLog base x

includes.name: clogBase

BlackBox.name: Clash.Promoted.Nat.logBaseSNat
BlackBox.type:
Clash.Promoted.Nat.logBaseSNat :: (FLog base x ~ CLog base x)
                                                    => SNat base -- ARG[1]
                                                    -> SNat x    -- ARG[2]
                                                    -> SNat (Log base x)

includes.name: clogBase
